shots.description: A nice shot, with some obvious cuts, adn I think the end is just a crane shot, but in his totality, this is great to watch and a great way to show a lots of characters and details of what they do at this particuliar moment...

One great and very long shot with, steadicam, crane, and a lot of characters...
Even if we can easily see the transition between the differents parts of the shot, I really like it...
